trans-unit.source: Explains how to use the StorSimple update feature and the Management Portal to install updates manually.
trans-unit.target: Explains how to use the StorSimple update feature and the Management Portal to install updates manually.

trans-unit.source: To install regular updates via the Management Portal
trans-unit.target: To install regular updates via the Management Portal

trans-unit.source: On the Devices page, select the device on which you want to install updates.
trans-unit.target: On the Devices page, select the device on which you want to install updates.

trans-unit.source: Navigate to Devices > Maintenance and scroll down to Software Updates.
trans-unit.target: Navigate to Devices > Maintenance and scroll down to Software Updates.

trans-unit.source: To check for updates, click Check Updates at the bottom of the page.
trans-unit.target: To check for updates, click Check Updates at the bottom of the page.

trans-unit.source: You will see a message if software updates are available.
trans-unit.target: You will see a message if software updates are available.

trans-unit.source: Click Install Updates to begin updating the device.
trans-unit.target: Click Install Updates to begin updating the device.

trans-unit.source: You will be notified when the update is successfully installed.
trans-unit.target: You will be notified when the update is successfully installed.
